Summary: Blue circle with light glossing moving accross the sky from South to North.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the Firework's at Prestonwood Country Club sitting on the grass we saw the UFO moving across the sky. Other people saw this and one child said are we being invadied. Other yeild out what is that?
